GlobeTrotterChat
Hello blank fragment
Hier steht jetzt mal was richtig Langes, das in 2 Zeilen reichen soll. Macht er das automatisch? Here is something really long that should be enough in 2 lines. Does it do that automatically? 00:00 Visibility type here… Send friendName HELLO LoggedInUserName add Friends Chats FriendsHub Settings Nickname Button Back Save Profile Native Language
